description: This file appears to be a bitbake recipe or configuration script used to build and install the nettle cryptographic library, including patches, dependencies, configuration steps, and test installation procedures.

methods.name: do_configure:prepend
methods.description: Prepends configuration steps to the configure process, copying aclocal.m4 to acinclude.m4 if necessary.

methods.name: do_compile_ptest
methods.description: Executes the make command to build the test components of the package.

methods.name: do_install_ptest
methods.description: Installs test suite files to the appropriate destination directory.
